item.title: Zawadi Nikuze - Healing & Rebuilding Our Communities in Democratic Republic Congo
RAIN WATER HARVESTING PART II
item.description: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=miiyG-LaKFc IN ADDITION TO MY FIRST VIDEO, I DID ONE MORE, THIS WILL COLLECT 825 GALLONS OF WATER THAT I WILL USE TO WATER MY TREES AND OTHER PLANTS, THAT WAY I DON’T TO…
